archimate:Device.name: Small Room / Personal Office AV Conferencing Solution (SR/POAVCS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Individual physician or administrator offices • Small private consultations, patient follow-ups, staff meetings, and telehealth sessions.
Specifications:
• Audio Quality: High-definition, echo cancellation, noise reduction capabilities • Video Resolution: Full HD (1080p) minimum • Connectivity Options: USB-C/USB-A, Bluetooth, HDMI, Wi-Fi • Microphone Sensitivity: Clear voice capture range up to 8 feet Built-in noise suppression • Speaker Quality: Integrated speaker (minimum 10W), clear speech output • Camera Specifications: 1080p webcam, autofocus, automatic brightness adjustment, wide-angle lens (90–110°) • Integration Compatibility: Certified compatibility with conferencing software (Microsoft Teams, Zoom, WebEx) • Ease of Setup: Plug-and-play, minimal IT intervention required • Form Factor: Compact all-in-one design for desktop mounting
• Power Requirements:
USB powered (single-cable connectivity)
